short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces some basic words from English to Spanish on a web page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For all those people out there who love Spanish, this chrome extension replaces some basic English words and sentences that we use on a daily basis into Spanish on a web page. It replaces words like 'Thanks', 'Hello', 'All right', 'Good', 'Bye', 'Mate', 'Please', 'How are you', 'Good Morning' and 'Good Night'. Enjoy!
